mockit.integration.junit4
Class RunNotifierDecorator

java.lang.Object
  mockit.integration.junit4.RunNotifierDecorator

@MockClass(realClass=org.junit.runner.notification.RunNotifier.class)
public final class RunNotifierDecorator
extends Object

Startup mock which works in conjunction with BlockJUnit4ClassRunnerDecorator to provide JUnit 4.5+ integration.

This class is not supposed to be accessed from user code. JMockit will automatically load it at startup.
